endpoints.description: Retrieve a comprehensive environmental impact report for a specific manufacturing process.
Submit data for evaluation to receive an environmental impact score.
Retrieve a list of recommended eco-friendly practices for manufacturers.
Upload detailed production dataset for analysis.
Access historical reports on environmental assessment outcomes.
Retrieve environmental impact information based on material composition.
Compare the environmental footprints of similar manufacturing processes.
Retrieve scheduling details for an environmental facility audit.
Request a new audit to evaluate a facility's environmental practices.
List available eco-certification programs and their requirements.
